New Records: The Yankees gave up a season-high 21 hits in the game
Key Match Events: The Cardinals scored five runs in the seventh inning, highlighted by a three-run double by Lars Nootbaar
The Yankees tied the game in the sixth inning with a sacrifice fly by Gleyber Torres
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone expressed frustration about the series loss and the team's performance
Juan Soto mentioned the importance of getting hot during the road trip
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees are still in first place despite their poor performance
The game was the start of a six-game road trip for the Yankees
Others: The game was affected by some light rain and slippery conditions
